abstract: Food and Drug Admin approves medical balloon that helps obese patients lose weight by filling up stomach; system is manufactured by Reshape Medical.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration on Tuesday approved an inflatable medical balloon that helps patients lose weight by filling up space in the stomach.

headline.main: F.D.A. Approves Balloon for Stomach to Treat Obesity
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Approves Balloon for Stomach to Treat Obesity

snippet: The Food and Drug Administration on Tuesday approved an inflatable medical balloon that helps patients lose weight by filling up space in the stomach.
